bibl.title: Agricultural Tenancy and Village Society in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Exploits the land lease contracts to set them into their particular social and agricultural contexts.

bibl.title: Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times

bibl.seg: ROWLANDSON Jane, Agricultural Tenancy and Village Society in Roman Egypt.
Alan K. BOWMAN and Eugene ROGAN (Edd.), Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times = Proceedings of the British Academy. 96 (Oxford, 1999) pp. 139-158, 2 tabl.
Exploits the land lease contracts to set them into their particular social and agricultural contexts.
